DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1-2 study MM-121 combination standard therapy non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study MM-121 Combination Therapy Patients With Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 : Patients Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) may enrol evaluate safety , tolerability recommend Phase 2 dose MM-121 combination standard therapy . Phase 2 : Patients Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) may enrol estimate progression-free survival MM-121 + standard therapy .
DOC.criteria: Patients locally advance metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer . Patients must > /= 18 year age . Patients must adequate Performance Status ( PS ) measure ECOG adequate end organ function . Patients recent history ( within 5 year ) another malignancy . Patients pregnant nursing . Patients clinically significant heart failure . Patients clinically significant eye gastrointestinal abnormality .
